title: Weight Manage
description: Developed a web application using React for weight management. It manages for weight entries by storing data in LocalStorage.

title: Url Shortener
description: Developed a web application using Django for shortening links. It generates shortened URLs, offering a simple and efficient solution for managing and sharing links.

title: E-commerce App
description: This is a Flutter-based e-commerce app that I built as part of my internship. I developed the front-end to ensure a seamless shopping experience.

title: Nutrivisor
description: This is a Python-based diet management progressive web app that includes machine learning.

title: Expensea
description: This is an expense tracking android application. It utilizes SQLite as the backend database, ensuring efficient data management.

title: WeatherSense
description: This is a web app for weather forecast and up-to-date weather information, crafted with HTML, CSS, and JavaScript.

title: TO-DO App
description: This is a web app for listing out tasks
